item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "We must rapidly begin the shift from a "thing-oriented" society to a "person-oriented" society. When machines and computers, profit motives and property rights are considered more important than people, the giant triplets of racism, materialism, and militarism are incapable of being conquered." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "I have decided to stick to love...Hate is too great a burden to bear." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Let no man pull you so low as to hate him." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Never, never be afraid to do what's right, especially if the well-being of a person or animal is at stake. Society's punishments are small compared to the wounds we inflict on our soul when we look the other way." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Everybody can be great...because anybody can serve. You don't have to have a college degree to serve. You don't have to make your subject and verb agree to serve. You only need a heart full of grace. A soul generated by love." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King, Jr.
item.description: "Only in the darkness can you see the stars." -- Martin Luther King, Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Those who are not looking for happiness are the most likely to find it, because those who are searching forget that the surest way to be happy is to seek happiness for others." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Wars are poor chisels for carving out peaceful tomorrows." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Forgiveness is not an occasional act, it is a constant attitude." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "We must live together as brothers or perish together as fools." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "There comes a time when silence is betrayal." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "A nation that continues year after year to spend more money on military defense than on programs of social uplift is approaching spiritual doom." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our scientific power has outrun our spiritual power. We have guided missiles and misguided men." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King, Jr.
item.description: "Hatred paralyzes life; love releases it. Hatred confuses life; love harmonizes it. Hatred darkens life; love illuminates it." -- Martin Luther King, Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Now there is a final reason I think that Jesus says, "Love your enemies." It is this: that love has within it a redemptive power. And there is a power there that eventually transforms individuals. Just keep being friendly to that person. Just keep loving them, and they can’t stand it too long. Oh, they react in many ways in the beginning. They react with guilt feelings, and sometimes they’ll hate you a little more at that transition period, but just keep loving them. And by the power of your love they will break down under the load. That’s love, you see. It is redemptive, and this is why Jesus says love. There’s something about love that builds up and is creative. There is something about hate that tears down and is destructive. So love your enemies. (from "Loving Your Enemies")" -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King, Jr
item.description: "True compassion is more than flinging a coin to a beggar; it comes to see that an edifice which produces beggars needs restructuring. " -- Martin Luther King, Jr

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by martin luther king jr
item.description: "It is cheerful to God when you rejoice or laugh from the bottom of your heart." -- martin luther king jr

item.title: Lakshmi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Power without love is reckless and abusive, and love without power is sentimental and anemic. Power at its best is love implementing the demands of justice, and justice at its best is power correcting everything that stands against love." -- Martin Luther King Jr.
